DESCRIPTION: #yPotion [REMOVE_SPACE]: Choose #b1 of #b3 random #yPower cards to add to your hand, it costs #b0 this turn.
Draw a card from your Spellbook. If you are #yAwakened (Played at least #b10 #yPowers this combat), drawn Spell cards are #yUpgraded [REMOVE_SPACE], drastically increasing their efficacy.
Cards with #yChant effects become more powerful for the rest of combat if the last played card in combat was a #yPower card.
Creatures with #yHex take #b20% more damage from the next Attack for each stack. #yHex is removed all at once after being attacked.
Any effect that causes you to lose [E] , even if you had none to lose. (Does not include [E] spent playing cards.)
Whenever you lose [E] , even if you had none to lose, loses HP equal to its #yManaburn [REMOVE_SPACE]. (Does not include [E] spent playing cards.)
